title: Question 14:
description: How do I increase my C-Ratio (Collateralization Ratio)?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
If your C-Ratio is below the Target Collateralization Ratio (currently set at 750% Collateral), Mintr will display your status as 'Poor' and you will need to increase your C-Ratio to earn maximum fees.

You can increase your C-Ratio in two ways:

1. Burning sUSD
2. Buying more SNX and mint more sUSD.
If your C-Ratio is below the Target Collateralization Ratio, you will be blocked and unable to claim your fee rewards. 

If your C-Ratio is above the Target Collateralization Ratio, Mintr will display your status as 'Good' and you can then:

1. Do nothing. Continue to receive fees against your existing minted sUSD
2. Mint more sUSD. To receive a greater proposition of fees in the next fee period.
If you choose to mint more sUSD, you may want to leave a buffer of sUSD to accommodate market fluctuation of the SNX price.

Your Collateralization Ratio must be above the Target Collateralization Ratio to be able to claim your fee rewards.

fields.title: For more details visit our help page:
